column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Not bad! I'm not a super ramen fan
column2: but they have a great variety of other food to try too. I highly suggest the fried brussel sprouts. They are really good in their dipping sauce. Its got a hip look to it
column3: and group seating for parties. The location is small
column5: so probably call ahead for reservations. The lighting is also kind of dim
